subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Carolina Hurricanes signed center Eric Staal to a seven-year contract extension worth $57.75 million. Staal, 23, will earn an average of $8.25 million starting in 2009-10 through the 2015-16 season. A two-time All-Star and the most valuable player of last year’s All-Star Game, Staal had 100 points three seasons ago in leading Carolina to its first Stanley Cup title. He bounced back from a subpar 2006-7 season with 38 goals and 44 assists last season.
